summary:
The Rangers Lodge is a small house located in Riverwood (just opposite the mill)
it is aimed at Hunter/Ranger players, and is a good starter house or indeed at any point
in the game.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][b]Like this mod? Try my new Dovah Cave and Tower mod![/color][/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14220&tab=4&navtag=/downloads/file/discussions.php?id=14220 

[color=yellow]The Rangers Lodge is a small house located in Riverwood (just opposite the mill)
it is aimed at Hunter/Ranger players, and is a good starter house or indeed at any point
in the game. 
The Ranger\'s Lodge Now has a Basement/Smithy.

The note is now on the table near the door.[/color]

[u][b][color=red]Please leave a comment and tell me what you think.

Don\'t forget to Endorse this mod if you like it![/color][/b][/u]

[color=yellow]Features:
- Lots of storage
- Bed
- Cooking Pot
- Alchemy Station
- Enchanting Station
- Tanning Rack
- 4 Weapon Plaques
- 1 Dagger Display Case
- 3 Mannequins
- Wood Chopping Block
- 4 Weapon Racks
- 1 Weapon & Shield Plaque
- Blacksmiths Forge
- Workbench
- Grinding Wheel
- A bit more storage

This mod is also on the Steam Workshop.

Install
Extract Ranger\'s_Lodge.esp into Skyrim\'s Data folder.

Uninstall
Remove Ranger\'s_Lodge.esp from Skyrim\'s Data folder.

Change log:

V1.0 - Initial Release
V1.1 - Changed Exterior to match Interior
V1.2 - Added 3 Working Weapon Plaques
V1.3 - Added 1 more plaque, a Dagger display case and a few minor tweaks
V1.4 - Added 2 Mannequins, a Wood Chopping Block and more minor tweaks
V1.5 - Added 1 Weapon Rack, 1 Weapon & Shield Plaque and Minor Tweaks
V1.6 - Improved Lighting
V1.7 - Exterior Decoration and Minor Tweaks
V1.8 - Ranger\'s Lodge Map Marker added
V2.0 - Added Basement to Ranger\'s Lodge with Smithy
V2.1 - Minor tweaks and optimisation
V2.2 - Navmesh Cleanup and moved the note from the door to the table near the door.

Credit
Bethesda[/color]

[color=red]Permissions
Please do not upload the Ranger\'s Lodge without my permission, and do not forget to credit me
as the original author.[/color]
author: Gamatria

files.name: Rangers Lodge V2_2
files.changelogHtml:
Redone Navmesh
Moved the note from the door to the table near the door
